title: Does Spectator mode show Ranked games anymore?
body: I only see Normal and ARAM on my client, is it the same for everyone else? Watching ranked is much more exciting since people are competing to advance.

replies.body: Yes, completely sucks, haven't seen anybody mentioning changes about it. It's even worse that usually the ones you spectate aren't even level 30. Yes, a lot of of them are smurfs, but I'm not lucking for some half-assed silver/gold-smurf-lvl22-normal-plays (even worse if it's ARAM) rather than some high quality ranked games to learn from...
Yeah, I even created a thread a few days ago about the same problem. Don't know what's the deal about it though
